<The Masnières Newfoundland Memorial
1:
--------------------
Text: Masnières Newfoundland Memorial:  Located at the north end of the town of Masnières, France, the memorial commemorates the participation of the Newfoundlanders in the taking and defense of the town during the First Battle of Cambrai between the 20th of November and 2 December 1917.
